alert.note: Alert for Clay; Quitman (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:03PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henry, northwestern Clay and Quitman Counties through 745 PM EDT/645 PM CDT/... At 702 PM EDT/602 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Georgetown, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Georgetown, Wire Bridge, Walter F George Lake, Bonapartes Retreat, Standleys Store, Watson Crossroads, Scottsboro Crossroads, Double Bridges, Crossroads, Ricks Place, Graball, Thomas Mill Creek, Hatcher, Morris, Bethel, Cotton Hill, Days Crossroads and Otho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
